itunes:title: Do you need a REST? Prepared for Rest
title: Do you need a REST? Prepared for Rest
description:
We plan our goals, work and go-get-em vacation, but what does it look like to be a homemaker who prioritizes and prepares for rest?

Thank you to our official Season 11 Sponsor American Blossom Linens!  americanblossomlinens.com / Coupon Code: HOMEMAKERCHIC20 We sleep on American Blossom.   Invest ONCE, enjoy for a lifetime. HOMEMAKERCHIC20 for 20% off

Where We Buy Our Groceries! https://bit.ly/azurechic - Organic/GMO-free co-op foodstuffs delivered to a stop in your neighborhood!

Entertain in Style:
For clean, refreshing wines: https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic GET a bottle for a penny with your first order! Drink better, not more! This is guilt-free wine, my friends. Paleo, Keto, and diet-friendly. You can get either 3, 6, or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly.   https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic

SHOW SOME LOVE www.Patreon.com/homemakerchicpodcast
Homemaker Chic is made possible by our Patrons.  Enjoy video and BOOK EXCURPS!  THANK YOU, Patrons – we love you! 

THANKS TO OUR SHOW SPONSORS
  www.toupsandco.com Coupon Code: CHIC10  Toups and Co. is your one-stop online shop for all things natural and organic. Quality ingredients in makeup, skincare, and more to an entirely new level.  We LOVE www.toupsandco.com

BE PREPARED! Run your kitchen girlfriend with a Harvest Right Freeze Dryer!  Waste not, want not!
https://bit.ly/harvestrighthomemaker

NEED DESIGN INSPO AFTER TODAY'S SHOW?  Join THE OLD WORLD DESIGN SOCIETY
A unique combination of a magazine publication and a private online design group with private lessons taught by Angela! -DESIGN YOUR SPACE Visit oldworld.parisiennefarmgirl.com

NEED KITCHEN INSPO AFTER TODAY'S SHOW? Join The Elliott Homestead Cooking Community / cook.theelliotthomestead.com  The Elliott Homestead Cooking Community is a way for you to get brand new, whole food recipes delivered to your door (or inbox) every month. Every recipe is designed to be simple, nutritious, whole-food centered, price conscious, and delicious.

House of Tocumen OUR FAVORITE rugs! www.hotrugs.net
Did you know, these beautiful, vintage handmade rugs are known to outlast their plastic counterparts by two decades!  Dress your home and use the code HOMEMAKER25

SOCIAL LINKS

  • Angela 
  • www.parisiennefarmgirl.com
  • oldworld.parisiennefarmgirl.com
  • www.youtube.com/c/ParisienneFarmgirl/featured
  • Instagram @parisiennefarmgirl
  • www.theelliotthomestead.com
  • www.youtube.com/c/Theelliotthomestead/featured
